channel.title: How to slow down the eating of sharks
channel.description: On my server i can eat like 5 sharks in 2 seconds... how do i make it 2 seconds?

item.title: How to slow down the eating of sharks
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

[quote=“rangadanger7, post:4, topic:366996”]and that heals you 27 hp but does not have any time? If your source is delta, try this:

case 385: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); if(c.eatemote==0){c.setAnimation(0x33D);} //c.playSound(317, 000, 020); c.sM("You eat the shark."); if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){ c.sM("It heals some health."); } if(c.currentHealth <= 0) { break; } c.deleteItem(385, slot, 1); c.currentHealth += 20; if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]) c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]; c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + "", 4016); break;
just remove like the sound things if your source does not support them. If it isnt delta, you should have specified that :)[/quote]

it should have a potions.java if it were a delta.

Read full topic
item.source: How to slow down the eating of sharks

@rangadanger7 wrote:

and that heals you 27 hp but does not have any time? If your source is delta, try this:

case 385: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); if(c.eatemote==0){c.setAnimation(0x33D);} //c.playSound(317, 000, 020); c.sM("You eat the shark."); if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){ c.sM("It heals some health."); } if(c.currentHealth <= 0) { break; } c.deleteItem(385, slot, 1); c.currentHealth += 20; if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]) c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]; c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + "", 4016); break;
just remove like the sound things if your source does not support them. If it isnt delta, you should have specified that

break;
